title: Qbistro opens new outlet in Dhaka
body: Qbistro, a chicken-based fast food chain brand-shop of Quality Integrated Agro Limited, has opened its Mohammadpur (Nurjahan Road) outlet in the capital. Noted artiste and senior banker Azam Khan inaugurated the Qbistro outlet through a ribbon and cake cutting ceremony in the Nurjahan Road area recently, said a press release on Friday. Ishrat Jazan Dilruba, Editor of ‘Shwadkahon’ magazine, country’s first ever food, cuisine-based regular publication, also joined the programme, attended among others by officials of Qbistro and its Mohammadpur distributor Foodbaaj. At present, Qbistro has its brand presence in Chattogram, Sylhet, Bandarban, Noakhali, Rangpur, Sirajganj, Joypurhat and Dhaka’s Mirpur, Mohammadpur, Uttara, Rampura and Malibag. With the aim of providing healthy and delicious chicken-based food varieties to general masses across the country, fast food chain brand Qbistro was established in 2017. In this connection, Quality Integrated Agro Limited (a sister concern of poultry feed giant Quality Feeds Limited) set up its own ISO certified poultry processing plant in 2017 with the aim of supplying safe chicken (antibiotic-free, preservative-free, MBM-free and tasting salt-free) sourced from its own farms. The company has a vision of ensuring customers quality food, which is tasty and at the same time maintains health and safety standards. Qbistro provides fast food and beverage items, including Fried Rice, Chicken Burger, Crispy Fried Chicken, Spicy Chicken, B.B.Q Chicken, Chicken Nuggets, Meatball, Sausage, Shashlikh, Sandwich, Juice, Coffee, Milkshake, and 12 varieties of tea, among others, at economy prices for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Services include live kitchen, walk-ins welcome, takeout, home delivery, reservations and waiter supply. To stay on top of the ever-changing world of business, subscribe now to our newsletters.
